title: How to Draw a Cat Face

steps.title: Draw a circle with a cross through it.
steps.content: Draw a circle with a cross through it. The cross should bend the way the cat drawing is facing.

steps.title: Add two curves for the neck and join these curves with the head.
steps.content: Add two curves for the neck and join these curves with the head.

steps.title: Make two triangles on top of the head for ears.
steps.content: Make two triangles on top of the head for ears. The triangles may be erect, twisted, or down, as in pointing toward the ground. Avoid making them floppy, like dog ears, as this is not a cat's ear.

steps.title: Sketch a small triangle for the nose where all of the lines intersect.
steps.content: Sketch a small triangle for the nose where all of the lines intersect. Then, slightly below it, make a shape like a sideways "3" for the mouth.

steps.title: Above the middle line, draw two eyes.
steps.content: Above the middle line, draw two eyes. The eyes should be pointing in the direction the cross bends.(To make it cuter, draw the eyes larger,but not too large).

steps.title: Now, shape the face.
steps.content: Now, shape the face. Draw fur around and on top of the cat's head.

steps.title: Last, take a black marker or pen that isn't likely to smudge.
steps.content: Last, take a black marker or pen that isn't likely to smudge. Trace the outline of the cat's head, ears and neck. Trace the eyes, nose and mouth. Then, take an eraser and erase all of the pencil marks. You can also color your cat, choosing any range of cat colors and fur patterns for inspiration.
